DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate whether possible healthy elderly participant generate baseline biomarker-based prediction rule ( PdR ) vaccine response ( post baseline absolute serum antibody titer ) use protocol select vaccine separately ; examine rank correlation coefficient pair post vaccination antibody titer within elderly individual .
DOC.brief_title: Vaccine Hyporesponse Healthy Elderly Participants ( MK-0000-131 AM2 )
DOC.criteria: Male female age 25 40 year old 65 year age old prestudy ( screen ) visit Has fever day screen Lacks Hepatitis B surface antigen seroreactivity If female 25 40 year age , pregnant breastfeeding , agree use effective contraception Has prior history Hepatitis B Virus infection Has BMI ( Body Mass Index ) > 35 If female 25 40 year age , pregnant , expect conceive , donate egg breastfeed Has receive immune globulin and/or blood product within 3 month prior first dose receive Has history immunosuppression result disease ( e.g. , malignancy ; human immunodeficiency virus [ HIV ] infection ) , currently take corticosteroid immunosuppressive/cytotoxic therapy ( cancer chemotherapy organ transplantation ) Has active neoplastic disease Has infection include upper respiratory viral syndrome 6 week prior plan collection baseline laboratory sample Has receive live virus vaccine inactivate vaccine schedule receive live virus vaccine inactivate vaccine period 6 week prior receipt first vaccine completion study visit
